message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
Take a smaller share now, or lose more later!
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but not too much!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
I'll give you a bigger share, but not that big!
You're running out of time, I'm running out of patience!
I'll give you a bigger share, but not that big, and I'm not running out of options!
